statusLine.command: input=$(cat); usage=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.current_usage'); if [ "$usage" != "null" ]; then current=$(echo "$usage" | jq '.input_tokens + .cache_creation_input_tokens + .cache_read_input_tokens'); size=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.context_window_size'); pct=$((current * 100 / size)); printf 'ctx: %d%%' "$pct"; else printf 'ctx: 0%%'; fi
